title: Coping with stress
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Body, Human

description: Outlines the factors that cause body stress; how the body reacts to stress; the kinds of problems that are stress-related; and ways of coping with stress such as exercise, relaxation, meditation and biofeedback. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
